abstract: Amid threats of student unrest and anger stirred by the Occupy Wall Street movement, Lloyd C. Blankfein of Goldman Sachs has canceled a scheduled appearance at Barnard College, citing a scheduling conflict.
snippet: Amid threats of student unrest and anger stirred by the Occupy Wall Street movement, Lloyd C. Blankfein of Goldman Sachs has canceled a scheduled appearance at Barnard College, citing a scheduling conflict.
lead_paragraph: The students of Barnard College were expecting to hear from Lloyd C. Blankfein, the chief executive of Goldman Sachs, as part of a lecture series titled “Power Talks.”

headline.main: Amid Protests, Blankfein Cancels College Talk
